Hussein Kamal (17 August 1932 - 24 March 2003) bụ onye Egypt na-eduzi ihe nkiri telivishọn
A na-ewere ya dị ka onye nduzi dị mkpa nke ihe nkiri ọdịnala ndị Ijipt. Otu n'ime ihe nkiri ya a ma ama bụ Chitchat on the Nile (1971), nkatọ nke ọdịda nke ọha mmadụ Ijipt n'oge Nasser
E tinyere ihe nkiri ya nke 1972 Empire M n'ime 8th Moscow International Film Festival na 1973.
